name: Demo_LDAPAdapter
raw_content:
<process name="Demo_LDAPAdapter">
    <sequence>

        <operation name="LDAP">
            <participant name="LDAPAdapter"/>
            <output message="LDAPInputMessage">
                <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
            </output>
            <input message="inmsg">
                <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
            </input>
        </operation>

    </sequence>
</process>
